channel.title: Client .jar
channel.description:
I want to know hwo to .jar my client .
I tried .jar before but i think it didnt work because the cache was in the foler (ima newb)
I need to know how to make it so it downloads the cache to the c/ drive on someones computer and jar the client :) but im not trying to make a webclient so :) Idk if its the same process and i checked out the how to make webclient tut on here and it was allllll over the place i got so lost and i dont wana ruin anything so help wud b nice
